summary: WHILE DRIVING MY 2011 FORD FUSION, IN A RESIDENTIAL AREA. MY POWER STEERING GAVE OUT ON ME. THERE WAS NO WARNING, THERE WAS NO INDICATION UNTIL AFTER IT HAPPENED. I HAD A CAR FULL OF MINOR CHILDREN BECAUSE I AM A CHEERLEADING COACH AND IT WAS EXTREMELY SCARY, TO SAY THE LEAST FOR ME AND THE KIDS.   *TR
